DOC.brief_summary: The aim study 1 ) identify IVUS determinant CAMS-derived myocardial territory subtend diseased vessel , 2 ) find IVUS determinant extent CAMS-derived myocardial size , 3 ) develop mathematical model integrate IVUS information myocardial territory stenosis severity predict extent CAMS-derived myocardial size .
DOC.brief_title: Intravascular Ultrasound Prediction Myocardial Size Coronary Computed Tomography-Derived Ischemic Burden Coronary Lesion
DOC.criteria: Age 18years old Patients least one epicardial coronary artery lesion ( include isolate leave main disease side branch ) visually estimate diameter stenosis > 50 % take coronary angiography , CT angiography IVUS Willing able provide inform write consent Instent restenosis Bypass graft Suspected coronary spasm even sufficient nitrate inject Cases IVUS image catheter fail cross lesion Poor quality IVUS CT image Chronic total occlusion Visible collateral flow angiography
